review: My family loves this, we use it all the time to show each other stuff from the web. We cast just about anything you can think of onto the screen. We use all of our iDevices and they work great you just have to use a google app to cast. We also use our laptops with chrome, which is the browser we use anyway, and cast anything from the web to the TV.
